title: TheAdditionalDimension
description: This element refers to each individual Plane of data pertaining to a given Additional Dimension.

subCategoriesOrder.TheAdditionalDimension: This element refers to each individual Plane of data pertaining to a given Additional Dimension.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this component.

TheAdditionalDimensionIndex.description: This field records the Index of this specific Plane within a vector of Additional Dimension data.

TheIncrementStamp.description: This field records the actual Step Increment value associated with each Plane of data along this Additional Dimension vector for this Image. While, this field is only required with non-uniform sampling along this Additional Dimension (as indicated by a value of -1 stored in AdditionalDImension/@ActualStepIncrement), it is always allowed.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
